title: 【命令问题】1.7.2中的书与笔
author: kid小东
txt_content:
1.7.2中的书与笔在命令方块中怎么空一页
跪求大触 帮忙{:10_522:}

replies.author: lzs1234
爱心魔王FHC
replies.txt_content:
/give @p minecraft:written_book 1 0 {title:"Test",author:Notch,pages:[P1,"",P3]}
这样第二页是空的

replies.author: lzs1234
replies.txt_content:
FHC红石 发表于 2016-3-18 21:34
/give @p minecraft:written_book 1 0 {title:"Test",author:Notch,pages:}
这样第二页是空的
亲测这样刷出来的书第二页是""，并不是空白

replies.author: kid小东
replies.txt_content:
lzs1234 发表于 2016-3-18 21:21
/give @p minecraft:written_book 1 0 
{title:"书本名字",author:作者,pages:["2333"," ","2333"]}
亲测可 ...
那请问怎么在命令方块中怎么空一行

replies.author: kid小东
replies.txt_content:
lzs1234 发表于 2016-3-18 22:03
你试试/give @p minecraft:written_book 1 0 {title:"书本名字",author:作者,pages:["{\"text\":\"2333\n ...
这个我试过了没用。。

replies.author: lzs1234
replies.txt_content:
kid小东 发表于 2016-3-18 21:47
那请问怎么在命令方块中怎么空一行
你试试/give @p minecraft:written_book 1 0 {title:"书本名字",author:作者,pages:["{\"text\":\"2333\n\n2333\"}"]}

两个\n连用不知道可行否
